languages.text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

languages.text: Пока это существо не повержено, шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} увеличивается для всех союзных некронов в бою.
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Пока это существо не повержено, шанс {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} увеличивается для всех союзных некронов в бою.
Пока это существо не повержено, шанс {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} увеличивается для всех союзных некронов в бою.

languages.text: この生物が死ぬまで、戦闘中の全ネクロンの味方は、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の永続的増加を得る。
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物が死ぬまで、戦闘中の全ネクロンの味方は、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の永続的増加を得る。

languages.text: 只要此生物存活，所有太空死灵盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}将会永久提高。
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 只要此生物存活，所有太空死灵盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}将会永久提高。

languages.text: Hasta que esta criatura muera, todos los aliados Necrones en combate ganan un aumento permanente a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta que esta criatura muera, todos los aliados Necrones en combate ganan un aumento permanente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.

languages.text: Bis diese Kreatur stirbt, erhalten alle Necron-Verbündeten im Kampf eine dauerhafte Erhöhung auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis diese Kreatur stirbt, erhalten alle Necron-Verbündeten im Kampf eine dauerhafte Erhöhung auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la mort de cette créature, tous les alliés Nécrons qui participent au combat bénéficient d'un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until this creature dies, all Necron allies in combat gain a permanent increase to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la mort de cette créature, tous les alliés Nécrons qui participent au combat bénéficient d'un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}.
